alert.note: Alert for Greenwood; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 9:39PM EDT until May 01 at 3:24AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Calhoun and Lexington Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Richland and Calhoun Counties. Saluda River At Chappells affecting Newberry, Saluda and Greenwood Counties. Enoree River At Whitmire affecting Newberry and Union Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Columbia affecting Richland and Lexington Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saluda River At Chappells. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Lowlands around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. Cattle grazing river bottomland should be moved to higher ground. At 16.0 feet, Extensive farmland and river bottomland around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. At 18.0 feet, The Saluda River Campground including the Campground Store downstream from Chappells becomes flooded. Campers should move to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EDT Friday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Flooded roadways are nearly impossible to see at night. Avoid traveling in this area. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning by 1000 AM EDT.
